lines.text: Had man not been given to invention and experiment, then tonight, sir, you would have eaten your dinner in a cave. You would've strewn the bones about the floor then wiped your fingers on a coat of animal skin. In fact, your lapels do look a bit greasy. Good night.
I fancy that I am the spider and you are the fly, Frankenstein.
I have become the victim of everything that Frankenstein and I ever advocated. My brain is in someone else's body.
